law.text: Except for vehicles operating under a TNC, household goods, property, or U-Drive-It certificate, the department shall prescribe and furnish a motor carrier license plate, which shall at all times be displayed on each motor carrier vehicle authorized to be operated under a certificate. A person shall not transfer a motor carrier license plate from one (1) motor vehicle to another, except by the authority and with the consent of the department.
law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 19, sec. 18, effective June 24, 2015. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 232, sec. 13, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. IV, sec. 20(2). -- Created 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 63, sec. 31, effective June 15, 1950.
